text: Ni ojo ti awon sobe-selu musulumi lokunrin ati awon sobe-selu musulumi lobinrin yoo wi fun awon t’o gbagbo pe: "E duro fun wa na, e je ki a mu ninu imole yin." A oo so fun won pe: "E pada s’eyin yin, ki e lo mu imole.” Won si maa fi ogiri kan, t’o ni ilekun saarin won. Ike wa ninu re, iya si wa ni ode re ni owo iwaju re
